title: Botanical Garden Culiacan
goal: Modernize the public website and build a donation and donor-management system to support fundraising and operations.
description: Led the development of a full-stack web platform for a city botanical garden, modernizing a static site into an interactive product with a donation portal and donor management system. Worked with external designers, stakeholders, analysts, and engineers to deliver a scalable UX, front end, and back end for real users, payments, and operations.

title: Escarlata Jewelry
goal: Rebuild a fast-growing fashion brand’s digital presence and turn a large social audience into online revenue.
description: Rebuilt Escarlata’s digital brand and Shopify store for a fashion label with over 64,000 Instagram followers, transforming its online presence into a modern, conversion-focused e-commerce experience. Led the design and development of a custom Shopify theme with Liquid and front-end code, supporting product launches and marketing campaigns. Following the relaunch, online sales increased by approximately 40%, creating a more scalable and reliable channel for the brand’s growth.

title: Escarlata Jewelry - Platform
goal: Build a scalable platform to manage orders, different inventories and shipping, enabling the business to streamline operations and improve efficiency.
description: Designed and developed Escarlata’s entire internal operations platform single-handedly, creating a scalable system to manage orders, multiple inventories, and shipping workflows. Implemented real-time data updates, operational automation, and secure management of business-critical information. The platform streamlined daily operations, improved accuracy, and enabled the business to handle growing order volumes efficiently.

title: Finance Platform
goal: Build a reliable and scalable front-end experience for a financial platform that mirrors investor activity from a brokerage service and executes those strategies at scale using users’ own capital.
description: Led the front end development of a platform focused on replicating investor trading behavior through secure brokerage integrations. Built scalable, high-performance user interfaces to visualize complex financial data, ensure accuracy, and support real-time interactions. Emphasized reliability, clarity, and performance to meet the demands of a high-stakes financial environment while adhering to strict privacy and compliance constraints.

title: Zeeto
goal: Deliver a high-performance, scalable front-end experience for a self-serve lead-generation platform used by advertisers and publishers to manage campaigns, audience targeting, and analytics efficiently.
description: Worked on the front-end implementation of a data-intensive product that helps businesses generate and manage high-quality leads through interactive workflows and real-time analytics. Modernized legacy components through iterative testing to improve performance, responsiveness, and user experience, while supporting large datasets and complex user flows. The work contributed to a more efficient, reliable platform used daily by hundreds of users to manage customer acquisition and monetization.
